TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ModuleInitializerAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ModuleInitializerAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ModuleInitializerAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 用于指示方法应在其包含模块的初始值设定项中调用的编译器。

span.span: Used to indicate to the compiler that a method should be called in its containing module's initializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在编译中找到一个或多个具有此属性的有效方法时，编译器将发出一个调用每个属性化方法的模块初始值设定项。When one or more valid methods with this attribute are found in a compilation, the compiler will emit a module initializer that calls each of the attributed methods. 某些要求适用于任何针对此属性的方法：Certain requirements are imposed on any method targeted with this attribute: - 方法必须是 `static` 。The method must be `static`. - 方法必须是普通成员方法，而不是属性访问器、构造函数、本地函数等。The method must be an ordinary member method, as opposed to a property accessor, constructor, local function, and so on. - 方法必须是无参数的。The method must be parameterless. - 该方法必须返回 `void`。The method must return `void`. - 方法不能是泛型或包含在泛型类型中。The method must not be generic or be contained in a generic type. - 此方法的有效可访问性必须为 `internal` 或 `public` 。The method's effective accessibility must be `internal` or `public`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [模块初始值设定项规范](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/master/docs/design/specs/Ecma-335-Augments.md#module-initializer)。For more information, see [the specification for module initializers](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/master/docs/design/specs/Ecma-335-Augments.md#module-initializer).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特性向方法提供附加的运行时保证。The attribute provides additional runtime guarantees to methods. 例如，可以保证标记的方法在调用任何其他方法之前运行，或者在整个模块中访问任何字段。For example, the marked methods are guaranteed to run before any other method is invoked or any field is accessed in the whole module.
